ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: then a blood-clot which He created and shaped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then formed into an embryo? Then He fashioned, shaped and proportioned
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then he became a clot, and then Allah made it into a living body and proportioned its parts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Was he not once just a drop of discharged sperm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He then became a clot – so Allah created him, then made him proper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he became an `Alaqah; then shaped and fashioned in due proportion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he was a clot of blood, so He created (him) then made (him) perfect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then he was a blood-clot, and He created and formed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then he became a clot; then (Allah) shaped and fashioned
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: which then became a leech-like clot; then God shaped and fashioned him in due proportion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he became a clot; then He created him and formed him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and then a clinging mass? Whereat He created and proportioned [him],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then did he become a leech-like clot; then did (Allah) make and fashion (him) in due proportion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he became an 'Alaqa (a clot); then (Allah) shaped and fashioned (him) in due proportion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then he was a clot of blood, then He created and formed him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he became a clot. And He created and proportioned?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:38] Then it, the drop of semen, became a clot; then He, God, created, from it man, and proportioned [him], making the parts of his body upright,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then he became a clot) then he became clotted blood; (then (Allah) shaped) him a living being (and fashioned) him with two hands, two feet, two eyes, two ears as well as with all the other members, and also placed in him the spirit.
